mapper.select: SELECT msg_id, msg_sender, msg_receiver, msg_content, msg_sep, msg_reg_dt, rsm_id, msg_notify, msg_read_yn, msg_use_yn, no, total_cnt FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.msg_reg_dt DESC) AS no, COUNT(*) OVER() AS total_cnt FROM MESSAGE A WHERE A.msg_receiver = #{msg_receiver} AND msg_use_yn = 1 ORDER BY A.msg_reg_dt ) WHERE no BETWEEN (#{PAGE_SIZE}*(#{PAGE_NUM}-1)+1) AND (#{PAGE_SIZE}*(#{PAGE_NUM}))

SELECT msg_id, msg_sender, msg_receiver, msg_content, msg_sep, msg_reg_dt, rsm_id, msg_notify, msg_read_yn, msg_use_yn, no, totalNo FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.msg_reg_dt DESC) AS no, COUNT(*) OVER() AS totalNo FROM MESSAGE A WHERE msg_sep = 0 AND msg_use_yn = 1 ORDER BY A.msg_reg_dt ) WHERE no BETWEEN (#{page_size}*(#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size}*(#{page_num}))
